61320741

http://en.ocn.com.cn/fckeditor_v2_6_3/editor/dialog/fck_about.htmlÅÐ¶Ï°æ±¾

http://en.ocn.com.cn/fckeditor_v2_6_3/editor/filemanager/browser/default/browser.html?Type=Image&Connector=%2Ffckeditor_v2_6_3%2Feditor%2Ffilemanager%2Fconnectors%2Faspx%2Fconnector.aspx


select * from (
    select b.*,@rownum:=@rownum+1,if(@pdept=b.id,@rank:=@rank+1,@rank:=1) as rank,@pdept:=b.id
    from (  
    select c.ID,C.frist_class,C.SUB_TITLE,r.child_class from report_class c,reports r 
		where 
			c.id=r.child_class and c.frist_class>=1 order by c.id,r.ID desc
    ) b ,(select @rownum :=0 , @pdept := null ,@rank:=0) c ) result  
    where rank <6;


$(input[name="newsUrl"])
